stages.logText: Gison, the man with the mushroom soup in the forest south of Fallhaven, got troubled from the mysterious force beneath his house. Whether its a natural seismic event or not, he asked me to check their basement by talking to Gael.
Gael wants me to bring him an exotic meat in exchange of permission to check their basement.
I brought some dried goat meat to Gael since it is the only meat I can find from another place.
Gael gaved me a key for their basement.
I opened Gael's hatch basement. It's time to solve the secret mystery beneath their house.
I killed a gigantic snake dwelling beneath Gison's house.
I killed all of the thieves as they loudly singing and playing musical instruments while celebrating their successful thefts.
I killed the thief warden and found an exit via rope.
I told Gison about the thieves' evil plan plotted and the gigantic snake lived in secret beneath their house. He is like a happy feet-dancing and celebrating.
Gison will give me cream mushroom soup in thanks if I bring him 2 of Bogsten's mushrooms, a milk, an empty bottle and 53 gold.

I told Gison about the thieves' evil plan plotted in secret beneath their house. He is somewhat happy because the house is shaking less often. So, he urged me to go back down and explore the basement to slay whatever creature lies below.
